hero.title: Welcome to Bar Elias Citizen Connect
hero.subtitle: Your hub for municipal news, events, and services

about.heading: About Us
about.title: About Bar Elias Municipality
about.subtitle: Serving our community with dedication, transparency, and excellence for over decades.
about.content: Bar Elias Municipality is committed to serving our citizens and visitors with transparent, efficient municipal services and up-to-date community resources.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are dedicated to providing exceptional municipal services, fostering community development, and ensuring the well-being of all residents through transparent governance and sustainable practices.

structure.title: Municipal Structure
structure.description: Our municipality operates through various departments and committees to serve our community effectively.

mayor.title: Mayor's Office
mayor.description: Executive leadership and strategic direction for municipal operations.

council.title: Municipal Council
council.description: Elected representatives making key decisions for our community.

services.title: Service Departments
services.description: Specialized teams delivering essential services to residents.

committees.title: Advisory Committees
committees.description: Community representatives providing input on local issues.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: Bar Elias has a rich history dating back centuries, serving as an important crossroads in the Bekaa Valley.
history.paragraph2: The modern municipality was established to serve the growing community and provide essential services to residents.
history.paragraph3: Today, we continue to build on this legacy while embracing innovation and sustainable development practices.

events.heading: Upcoming Events
events.noEvents: No upcoming events at the moment.

report.heading: Report an Issue
report.description: If you see something that needs attention—potholes, broken streetlights or otherwise—let us know.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for inquiries, support, or feedback. We're here to help.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

footer.about: Bar Elias Municipality official site, serving our citizens and visitors with municipal services, news, and community resources.

families.subtitle: Browse and search family records in our municipal registry.
families.search: Search families by name or unification number...

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.subtitle: Our commitment to making our website accessible to everyone, including people with disabilities.
accessibility.intro: The Municipality of Bar Elias is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

tool.title: Accessibility Tools Available
tool.description: Use the accessibility widget at the bottom right of the page to adjust font sizes, contrast, and other display settings to meet your needs.

accessibility.thankyou: Thank you for helping us improve accessibility for all users.
